name: killcommand
description: Provides users with the tools of murder through chat commands.
author: orion

authorized-users.description: Users who are authorized to create/use doors

authorized-role.description: The role that allows users to create/use doors

commands.name: /kill
commands.description: Attempts a kill on a target player. Informs the victim that they have been killed.

args.name: message
args.description: An optional message if you would like to let your victim know why they were killed.

commands.name: /execute
commands.description: Attempts a kill on a target player. Informs the entire server that they have been killed.

args.name: message
args.description: An optional message if you would like to let the server know why the victim was killed.

commands.name: /assassinate
commands.description: Attempts a kill on a target player. Only the user will know that the victim was killed.
